title: 'It's bittersweet': Leclerc disappointed to finish second to Ferrari teammate Vettel – video
text:
It was another successful day for Ferrari as they finished in the top two spots at the Singapore Grand Prix, with Sebastian Vettel claiming his first win in over a year. Teammate Charles Leclerc finished second in what he called a ‘bittersweet feeling’ after Vettel leapfrogged the Frenchman into first place due to Ferrari’s pitstop strategy. It was a fourth place finish for Mercedes and Lewis Hamilton, who said: ‘today wasn’t great, we just have to try better in the next one’

• Sebastian Vettel wins F1 Singapore Grand Prix in Ferrari one-two
description: It was another successful day for Ferrari as they finished in the top two spots at the Singapore Grand Prix, with Sebastian Vettel claiming his first win in over a year
